alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 16 at 3:27AM EST until November 16 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches for a storm total of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
